solution.text:
We know \(\angle pqr=\angle rts=90^{\circ }\) [right angle triangle
also, \(qr\times rt= st \times qp\Rightarrow \frac {qr}{st}=\frac {qp}{rt}\) [given]
So by SAS similarity criteria, \(\bigtriangleup \) rqp ~ \(\bigtriangleup \) str
\(\Rightarrow \frac {qr}{st}=\frac {rp}{sr}\Rightarrow qr\times sr= rp \times st\)

content.text:
In the given figure \(qr\times rt= st \times qp\).
